FAQ / Wave 2 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Fog of War

  1. Who scraps cards from their hand first? [Source: WotC]
    Actually, you each scrap cards at the same time. Each player should choose the cards theyâ€™re going to scrap and set them aside without revealing them. Once both players are ready, they turn them face up and put them in their scrap pile.
  2. I have a question about Wave 1 Shockwave's bot mode ability. If I cause my opponent to scrap several cards at once (like with Fog of War), do they take 1 damage per card they scrap of just 1 damage in total. [Source: WotC]
    1 damage per card scrapped.
